summary: This is an email chain from March 2021 between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York, forwarding an email and attachment (likely a PDF) for review in relation to the Epstein case. It indicates ongoing review of case materials by prosecutors.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the original email on March 26, 2021, who came across an email and attachment during a review, tagged it for further review, and circulated it.

events.title: Initial discovery of email for review
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney came across an email and attachment while doing a review, tagged it for further review, and circulated it.

events.title: Forwarding of review email
events.description: Another individual saw the attached email and added it to the email chain, indicating ongoing case review.

locations.name: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
locations.address: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007

keyFacts: Prosecutors in the Southern District of New York were actively reviewing Epstein-related materials as of March 2021.
An email and attachment were discovered and tagged for further review, suggesting ongoing investigative or prosecutorial work.
The correspondence indicates a chain of review and circulation of evidence among legal staff.
